title: Just a Taste!
description:
Host Martie Duncan shares a first taste of Allrecipes new podcast, Homemade. Plus, Guy Fieri hints at an obsession with grits, Aarti Sequeria considers cooking in a world of instant gratifications, and Justin Warner reminisces about 1990s variations of ranch dressing. We’ll be serving up more stories and delicious ideas soon!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
